item.title: 2025 Tokyo Journey
item.description: Top 3 Memorable Experiences There is something to learn even from those you donâ€™t particularly like. Hokusai's wave is impressive. I need to buy a pantry for my wife. Top 3 Restaurants Oborodzuki Imakatsu Ginza Moheji Hanare Key Schedule 2025-04-09 Imakatsu Ginza 2025-04-10 shigekuni Peter Luger Steak House Tokyo 2025-04-11 Path Ginza West Aoyama Garden CAMELBACK sandwich&espresso Genshiyaki Hibachi 2025-04-12 wellk Oborodzuki 2025-04-13 shigekuni Cafe de l'ambre The Sumida Hokusai Museum Moheji Hanare IKI OYSTER BAR 2025-04-14 Egg Baby Cafe Nihonbashi Kaisen Don Tsujihan - Ark Hills Branch
